Grace
Released5 December 2013 (Update)
MembersYes
RaceHuman
LocationRogues' Den
Sells itemsGrace's Graceful Clothing
GenderFemale

ExamineAn amazingly agile lady.
Map
Advanced data
NPC ID5919

Grace runs the store Grace's Graceful Clothing in the Rogues' Den and exchanges marks of grace earned by participating in rooftop agility courses for parts of the graceful clothing set which reduces weight as well as amylase packs which contain 100 amylase crystals, which are combined with super energy potions to create stamina potions.

Grace keeps count of the number of completed laps of every rooftop or agility course in the game. Players may speak to Grace to toggle completed lap chatbox announcements, which does not disable tracking their count.

She owns a dog named Mark.

Grace's lap counting interface.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
16 September 2020
(update | poll)

Grace now tracks how many rooftop courses players have done, and can toggle the rooftop course counter message on and off.

24 July 2014
(update | poll)

Grace now wears the updated graceful outfit.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • After the graceful outfit's graphical update in an update on 17 July 2014, Grace still wore the previous version of the outfit. This was an oversight, and was properly updated the next week.
  • Grace was named after Mod Mat K's dog.[1]

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 2 October 2020. (Archived from the original on 8 March 2021.) Mod Ash: "No, the item descriptions were pretty specifically about one's graceful quality. I wrote them on purpose. Grace herself was named after Mod Mat K's dog, for what it's worth. That's why she was given a dog that resembles his dog."
